td.content: s:patient presents with Kidney. he is a male laundry worker aged 48 yrs. o:Height 71 in, Weight 116 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 63, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 14 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isotonic Saline (0.9%) - 10 mL/kg per dose, and ordered CT abdomen/pelvis.

s:a 48 yo white male laundry worker presents with Kidney for about 2 days. he denies smoking consumes more than 4 alcoholic drinks daily o:Height 71 in, Weight 116 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isotonic Saline (0.9%) - 10 mL/kg per dose, and ordered CBC, Basic Metabolic Panel.
